    About Us

    Helping the needy is what considered as the work of god. Most the times we do not find platform for helping. Here are we for you to help you donate food for the needy one. Just login to the site enter your help and we will make it to the needy.
    The working of the platform can be broadly classified in two following branches:-

    Donor Side

    Register yourself, and click on donate, and keep the rest for us.

    Police

    Police man or concerned person nearby will get a notification, and will serve as an agent between Donor and Needy.
